attributes.action: No to a Speed Limit of 40km/hour for ATVs
attributes.additional_details:
All Terrain Vehicles (ATVs) are a vital tool for a farmer's daily tasks. They are used to  round up and herd livestock and catch stray animals. Distributing feed accross farms which often stretch for miles, an ATV is the only effective  and efficient way of doing the job.
A speed limit of 40 km/h would seriously hamper the daily work of any farmer
